markdown: **Activate** <actions string="" />Cast a Spell; This activation takes <actions string="Two Actions" /> if the spell normally takes <actions string="Single Action" /> to cast, or <actions string="Three Actions" /> if the spell normally takes <actions string="Two Actions" />;  **Frequency** once per day, plus overcharge;   **Effect** You Cast the Spell. Its range increases by 30 feet. As normal for increasing ranges, if the spell normally has a range of touch, its range extends to 30 feet.
